heroes.name: Yaenwoo
heroes.details: Great passive research speed buff, useful for F2P players or active use if you lack legendaries.

heroes.name: Amane
heroes.details: Excellent passive healing speed buff, ideal for lower-legendaries setups.

heroes.name: Fahd
heroes.details: Solo hunting march speed buff, but limited overall utility.

heroes.name: Eric
heroes.details: Sturdy defender ideal for Exploration and sustainable in Expedition.

heroes.name: Jaeger
heroes.details: Stun and AoE effects work well in Exploration; decent Expedition support.

heroes.name: Petra
heroes.details: High potential kit hindered by heavy RNG scaling and proc dependency.

heroes.name: Zoe
heroes.details: Damage tank with excellent Conquest and Expedition synergy.

heroes.name: Marlin
heroes.details: Powerful AoE and crowd control; Expedition viability depends on RNG.

heroes.name: Hilde
heroes.details: Healer with situational Expedition value and inconsistent proc chances.

heroes.name: Amadeus
heroes.details: VIP hero with strong longevity; expensive to level up without investment.

heroes.name: Jabel
heroes.details: Starter hero with stuns and buffs; gradually replaced by newer units.

heroes.name: Helga
heroes.details: Early powerhouse; loses relevance in later generations.

heroes.name: Howard
heroes.details: Tanky suppression specialist with Expedition damage reduction.

heroes.name: Quinn
heroes.details: Early-game damage dealer with strong suppression output.

heroes.name: Saul
heroes.details: Useful for construction boosts via passive Expedition abilities.

heroes.name: Diana
heroes.details: Expedition march speed and stamina reduction make her handy early on.

heroes.name: Chenko
heroes.details: Limited scalability and usefulness after early-game.

heroes.name: Seth
heroes.details: Suppression tank with passive Iron Mine income buff.
expeditionSkills: Iron: Increase the Town's Iron Output by 5%/10%/15%/20%/25%
Iron: Increase his Iron Mining Speed in the Wilderness by 5%/10%/15%/20%/25%

heroes.name: Olive
heroes.details: Basic damage dealer with passive hunting income bonus.
expeditionSkills: Bread: Increase the Town's Mill Output by 5%/10%/15%/20%/25%
Bread: Increase her Resource Gathering Speed in the Wilderness by 5%/10%/15%/20%/25%

heroes.name: Gordon
heroes.details: Healing kit that's not strong enough when really needed.

heroes.name: Edwin
heroes.details: Early-game AoE and stun; long-term value in Stone Mine passive.
expeditionSkills: Stone: Increase the Town's Quarry Output by 5%/10%/15%/20%/25%
Stone: Increase his Stone Mining Speed in the Wilderness by 5%/10%/15%/20%/25%

heroes.name: Forrest
heroes.details: Only notable for his passive Logging income boost.
expeditionSkills: Wood: Increase the Town's Sawmill Output by 5%/10%/15%/20%/25%
Wood: Increase his Wood Gathering Speed in the Wilderness by 5%/10%/15%/20%/25%
